ll MOD = int(1e9) + 7;

int debug = 1;
const int N = int(1e5) + 5;
using namespace std;
ll fact[21];
int main()
{
      int i,j,n,t;
      ios::sync_with_stdio(false);
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		cin>>n;
		ll ans = 0 ;
		fact[0] = 1;
		for(i = 1; i <= n; i++) fact[i] = i*fact[i-1];
		rep(i,n+1)
		{
			ans += fact[n]/fact[i]*(i%2 == 0? 1:-1);
		}
		cout<<ans<<endl;
	}
}
